title: Fresh Plain Curd (Dahi)
name: Fresh Plain Curd (Dahi)
description: Fresh and creamy plain curd made from pure milk. Rich in probiotics and perfect for daily consumption. Ideal for making lassi, raita, or enjoying with meals. Naturally set without any artificial additives.
shortDescription: Fresh creamy plain curd, rich in probiotics

images.title: Premium Salted Butter
images.name: Premium Salted Butter
images.description: Rich and creamy salted butter made from fresh cream. Perfect for cooking, baking, and spreading on bread. Made from pure cow's milk with the right amount of salt for enhanced flavor. Stored fresh and delivered at optimal temperature.
images.shortDescription: Rich creamy salted butter, perfect for cooking and baking
images.storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 2-4°C. Use within 30 days of opening.

images.title: Fresh White Butter (Makkhan)
images.name: Fresh White Butter (Makkhan)
images.description: Traditional homemade style white butter (makkhan) made from fresh cream. Unsalted and pure, perfect for parathas, rotis, and traditional Indian cooking. Made fresh daily without any preservatives or artificial additives.
images.shortDescription: Traditional white butter, unsalted and pure
images.storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 2-4°C. Best consumed within 15 days.

images.title: Pure Cow Ghee
images.name: Pure Cow Ghee
images.description: Premium quality pure cow ghee made from fresh cow milk butter. Slow-cooked using traditional methods to retain natural aroma and taste. Rich in vitamins A, D, E, and K. Perfect for cooking, tempering, and religious ceremonies.
images.shortDescription: Premium pure cow ghee, traditional slow-cooked

images.alt: Pure cow ghee in traditional container

images.storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Refrigeration not required. Use clean, dry spoon.

images.title: Premium Buffalo Ghee
images.name: Premium Buffalo Ghee
images.description: Rich and aromatic buffalo ghee made from pure buffalo milk butter. Known for its distinct flavor and higher nutritional content. Traditionally prepared using slow-cooking methods. Ideal for special occasions, sweets, and authentic Indian cooking.
images.shortDescription: Rich buffalo ghee, distinct flavor and nutrition
images.storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Refrigeration not required. Use clean, dry spoon.

storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 2-4°C. Consume within 4 days of opening.

title: Fresh Buttermilk (Chaas)
name: Fresh Buttermilk (Chaas)
description: Traditional fresh buttermilk made from churned yogurt. Light, refreshing, and perfect for digestion. Rich in probiotics and ideal as a healthy drink or with meals. Made fresh daily with no preservatives.
shortDescription: Traditional fresh buttermilk, light and refreshing
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 2-4°C. Best consumed fresh within 2 days.

title: Sweet Lassi
name: Sweet Lassi
description: Creamy and sweet traditional lassi made with fresh yogurt, sugar, and a hint of cardamom. A perfect refreshing drink for any time of the day. Served chilled and made fresh daily with premium ingredients.
shortDescription: Creamy sweet lassi with cardamom, refreshing drink
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated and consume immediately. Best served chilled.

title: Fresh Paneer(100g)
name: Fresh Paneer (100g)
description: Premium quality fresh paneer made from pure cow's milk. Soft, creamy texture perfect for Indian curries, grilling, and snacking. Rich in protein and calcium, made daily to ensure maximum freshness and taste.
shortDescription: Fresh homemade paneer, soft and creamy texture
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 2-4°C. Use within 3 days of opening.

title: Processed Cheese Slices
name: Processed Cheese Slices
description: Convenient individually wrapped processed cheese slices. Perfect for sandwiches, burgers, and quick snacks. Smooth melting texture with a mild, creamy flavor that appeals to all age groups.
shortDescription: Ready-to-use processed cheese slices, 10 slices pack
storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Refrigerate after opening.

title: Cheese Cubes
name: Cheese Cubes
description: Premium cheese cubes perfect for snacking, salads, and cooking. Pre-cut for convenience, these cubes offer a firm texture and rich flavor. Ideal for cheese platters and appetizers.
shortDescription: Ready-to-eat cheese cubes, perfect for snacking
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 2-8°C. Consume within 14 days.

title: Cheese Spread(200g)
name: Cheese Spread
description: Smooth and creamy cheese spread perfect for bread, crackers, and toast. Easy to spread consistency with rich cheese flavor. Great for breakfast, snacks, and party appetizers.
shortDescription: Creamy cheese spread for bread and crackers
storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Refrigerate after opening.

title: Mozzarella Cheese
name: Mozzarella Cheese
description: Fresh mozzarella cheese with excellent stretching properties. Perfect for pizzas, pasta, and Italian dishes. Mild flavor with creamy texture that melts beautifully. Made from fresh milk for authentic taste.
shortDescription: Fresh mozzarella cheese, perfect for pizza and pasta
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 2-4°C. Use within 10 days of opening.

title: Whole Wheat Atta (Ashirvad)
name: Whole Wheat Atta (Ashirvad)
description: Premium quality whole wheat flour made from carefully selected wheat grains. Stone ground to retain natural nutrients, fiber, and authentic taste. Perfect for making soft rotis, parathas, and traditional Indian breads. Rich in protein, fiber, and essential minerals.
shortDescription: Premium whole wheat flour, stone ground for nutrition

images.alt: Premium whole wheat atta flour package

storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Keep away from moisture and sunlight.

title: Maida (Refined Flour)
name: Maida (Refined Flour)
description: Pure refined wheat flour with fine texture and neutral taste. Ideal for baking cakes, cookies, pastries, and making naan, kulcha, and various snacks. Gives excellent rise and soft texture to baked goods.
shortDescription: Pure refined flour, perfect for baking and cooking
storageInstructions: Store in airtight container in cool, dry place.

title: Suji / Rava (Coarse & Fine)
name: Suji / Rava (Coarse & Fine)
description: Premium quality semolina available in both coarse and fine varieties. Made from durum wheat, perfect for making upma, halwa, idli, dosa batter, and various South Indian dishes. Rich texture and authentic taste.
shortDescription: Premium semolina, coarse and fine varieties available
storageInstructions: Keep in dry place. Store in airtight container after opening.

title: Besan (Gram Flour)
name: Besan (Gram Flour)
description: Pure gram flour made from ground chickpeas. High in protein and naturally gluten-free. Perfect for making pakoras, dhokla, besan ladoo, and various Indian snacks. Rich nutty flavor and excellent binding properties.
shortDescription: Pure gram flour from chickpeas, protein-rich and gluten-free
storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Keep away from moisture.

title: Makka Atta
name: Makka Atta
description: Fine corn flour made from quality corn kernels. Naturally gluten-free and rich in fiber. Perfect for making makka roti, corn bread, thickening soups and gravies. Light yellow color with sweet corn aroma.
shortDescription: Pure corn flour, gluten-free and fiber-rich

images.alt: Yellow corn flour makka atta package

storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Keep sealed to maintain freshness.

title: Bajra Atta
name: Bajra Atta
description: Nutritious bajra (pearl millet) flour rich in iron, protein, and fiber. Ideal for making healthy bajra roti and traditional Rajasthani dishes. Gluten-free and perfect for diabetic-friendly meals. Earthy flavor and dense nutrition.
shortDescription: Nutritious bajra flour, iron-rich and gluten-free

images.alt: Grey bajra pearl millet flour package

storageInstructions: Store in airtight container. Keep in cool, dry place.

title: Jowar Atta
name: Jowar Atta
description: Pure jowar (sorghum) flour packed with protein, fiber, and antioxidants. Naturally gluten-free and ideal for weight management. Perfect for making soft jowar rotis and healthy meals. Light texture with mild, pleasant taste.
shortDescription: Pure jowar flour, protein-rich and weight-friendly

images.alt: Light brown jowar sorghum flour package

storageInstructions: Keep in cool, dry place. Store in airtight container.

title: Ragi Atta
name: Ragi Atta
description: Nutrient-dense ragi (finger millet) flour rich in calcium, iron, and amino acids. Excellent for growing children and bone health. Naturally gluten-free with distinctive earthy flavor. Perfect for making healthy ragi rotis and porridge.
shortDescription: Calcium-rich ragi flour, excellent for bone health

images.alt: Dark brown ragi finger millet flour package

storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

title: Toor Dal (Arhar Dal)
name: Toor Dal (Arhar Dal)
description: Premium quality toor dal (pigeon peas) - the most commonly used dal in Indian households. Rich in protein, fiber, and essential nutrients. Perfect for making sambar, rasam, and traditional dal preparations. Clean, sorted, and ready to cook.
shortDescription: Premium toor dal, protein-rich and versatile

images.alt: Yellow toor dal arhar dal package

storageInstructions: Store in airtight container. Excellent for sprouting and traditional recipes.

title: Chana Dal
name: Chana Dal
description: High-quality chana dal made from split chickpeas. Rich in protein and fiber with a nutty flavor. Ideal for making dal tadka, chana dal halwa, and various South Indian dishes. Clean, uniform grains with excellent cooking quality.
shortDescription: Premium chana dal, nutty flavor and protein-rich
storageInstructions: Keep in dry place. Store in airtight container to prevent moisture.

title: Moong Dal (Dhuli, Khade)
name: Moong Dal (Dhuli, Khade)
description: Premium moong dal available in both dhuli (split & skinless) and khade (whole with skin) varieties. Light, easily digestible, and quick cooking. Perfect for making khichdi, moong dal tadka, and healthy soups. Rich in protein and low in fat.
shortDescription: Premium moong dal, dhuli and khade varieties available

images.alt: Yellow moong dal dhuli and green khade package

storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Keep away from moisture and pests.

title: Masoor Dal
name: Masoor Dal
description: Premium split masoor dal (red lentils) that cooks quickly and has a mild, earthy flavor. High in protein and iron. Perfect for making quick dal preparations, soups, and curries. Splits easily and has excellent cooking quality.
shortDescription: Premium masoor dal, quick-cooking red lentils
storageInstructions: Keep in airtight container in cool, dry place.

title: Khade Masoor
name: Khade Masoor
description: Whole masoor lentils with skin intact, providing higher fiber content and robust flavor. Takes longer to cook but offers superior nutrition and taste. Perfect for making hearty curries and traditional preparations. Rich earthy flavor with firm texture.
shortDescription: Whole masoor lentils with skin, fiber-rich

images.alt: Dark brown whole masoor lentils package

storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Keep sealed to prevent pest infestation.

title: Urad Dal
name: Urad Dal
description: Premium quality urad dal (black gram) essential for South Indian cuisine. Perfect for making dosa, idli, vada, and dal makhani. Rich in protein and has excellent binding properties. Clean, sorted grains with consistent quality.
shortDescription: Premium urad dal, essential for South Indian dishes
storageInstructions: Keep in airtight container away from moisture and sunlight.

title: Kabuli Chana (White Chana)
name: Kabuli Chana (White Chana)
description: Large, creamy white kabuli chana (chickpeas) with excellent texture and taste. Perfect for making chole, hummus, salads, and various curries. High in protein, fiber, and essential nutrients. Premium quality with uniform size.
shortDescription: Premium kabuli chana, large white chickpeas

images.alt: Large white kabuli chana chickpeas package

storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Soak before cooking for best results.

title: Kala Chana (Black Chana)
name: Kala Chana (Black Chana)
description: Nutritious black chana (black chickpeas) with robust flavor and firm texture. Higher in fiber and antioxidants than white chana. Perfect for making healthy curries, salads, and sprouting. Rich source of protein and iron.
shortDescription: Nutritious black chana, fiber and antioxidant-rich
storageInstructions: Keep in dry place. Ideal for soaking and sprouting.

title: Rajma
name: Rajma
description: Premium quality rajma (kidney beans) with rich, creamy texture when cooked. Perfect for making the beloved rajma curry with rice. High in protein, fiber, and essential minerals. Large, uniform beans with excellent cooking quality.
shortDescription: Premium rajma kidney beans, perfect for curry

images.alt: Dark red rajma kidney beans package

storageInstructions: Soak overnight before cooking. Store in airtight container.

title: Green Peas
name: Green Peas
description: Dried green peas (matar) perfect for making curries, pulao, and various Indian dishes. Sweet flavor and firm texture when cooked. Rich in protein, fiber, and vitamins. Clean, sorted, and ready to cook after soaking.
shortDescription: Dried green peas, sweet flavor and versatile
storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Soak before cooking for better texture.

title: Poha (Flattened Rice)
name: Poha (Flattened Rice)
description: Premium quality poha (flattened rice) made from carefully selected rice grains. Light, easily digestible, and quick to prepare. Perfect for making traditional poha breakfast, upma, and various snacks. Rich in iron and carbohydrates, ideal for a healthy start to your day.
shortDescription: Premium poha flakes, quick cooking and nutritious

images.alt: White poha flattened rice flakes package

storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Keep in airtight container to maintain crispness.

title: Kasuri Methi (Dried Fenugreek Leaves)
name: Kasuri Methi
description: Premium quality dried fenugreek leaves with an authentic aroma and flavor. Essential for Indian cooking, adds a distinctive taste to curries, parathas, and dal. Hand-picked and naturally dried to preserve nutrients and flavor.
shortDescription: Premium dried fenugreek leaves for authentic Indian cooking
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container. Keep away from direct sunlight.

title: Sambhar Masala
name: Sambhar Masala
description: Traditional South Indian sambhar masala blend for authentic dal preparations. Perfect mix of roasted spices and lentils that gives sambhar its distinctive tangy and aromatic flavor. Essential for South Indian cooking.
shortDescription: Traditional South Indian sambhar spice blend
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

title: Jaljeera Powder
name: Jaljeera Powder
description: Refreshing jaljeera powder mix with cumin, mint, and tangy spices. Perfect for making instant jaljeera drink - just add water, ice, and enjoy this cooling summer beverage. Great for digestion and beating the heat.
shortDescription: Refreshing jaljeera drink mix powder
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

title: Hing (Asafoetida)
name: Hing
description: Pure asafoetida (hing) with strong aroma and distinctive flavor essential for Indian cooking. A pinch adds incredible depth to dals, vegetables, and curries. Known for digestive properties and enhancing umami flavors in vegetarian dishes.
shortDescription: Pure asafoetida for authentic Indian cooking
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container away from other spices.

title: Bay Leaves (Tej Patta)
name: Bay Leaves
description: Premium quality whole bay leaves (tej patta) with intense aroma and flavor. Essential for Indian cooking, perfect for biryanis, curries, and pulao. Carefully selected and naturally dried to maintain freshness and potency.
shortDescription: Aromatic whole bay leaves for Indian cooking
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

title: Oregano (Dry - Pizza Seasoning)
name: Oregano
description: Premium quality dried oregano perfect for pizzas, pasta, and Italian cuisine. Aromatic and flavorful herb that enhances the taste of Mediterranean dishes. Finely crushed for easy sprinkling and maximum flavor release.
shortDescription: Premium dried oregano for pizza and Italian dishes
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

title: Black Salt (Kala Namak)
name: Black Salt
description: Authentic Himalayan black salt (kala namak) with distinctive sulfurous aroma and tangy taste. Perfect for chaats, fruits, salads, and traditional Indian dishes. Rich in minerals and known for digestive properties.
shortDescription: Authentic Himalayan black salt for chaats and Indian cuisine
storageInstructions: Store in a dry place in an airtight container.

title: Rock Salt (Sendha Namak)
name: Rock Salt
description: Pure rock salt (sendha namak) ideal for fasting and daily cooking. Unprocessed and natural with no added chemicals. Perfect for vrat recipes, seasoning, and as a healthier alternative to regular salt.
shortDescription: Pure rock salt for fasting and healthy cooking
storageInstructions: Store in a dry place. No special storage required.

title: Iodized Salt (Premium Quality)
name: Iodized Salt
description: Premium quality iodized salt fortified with iodine for healthy thyroid function. Pure, refined, and free-flowing salt perfect for everyday cooking and seasoning. Essential for maintaining good health.
shortDescription: Premium iodized salt for daily cooking
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture.

title: Chaat Masala
name: Chaat Masala
description: Tangy and flavorful chaat masala blend perfect for fruits, salads, snacks, and street food. A perfect mix of spices including black salt, cumin, coriander, and dried mango powder for that authentic chaat taste.
shortDescription: Tangy chaat masala for snacks and street food
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

title: Garam Masala
name: Garam Masala
description: Authentic garam masala blend with perfect balance of whole spices including cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and bay leaves. Essential for Indian curries, biryanis, and traditional dishes. Freshly ground for maximum flavor.
shortDescription: Authentic whole spice garam masala blend
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

title: Sabzi Masala
name: Sabzi Masala
description: Perfect vegetable masala blend for all types of Indian vegetable dishes. A balanced mix of spices that enhances the flavor of any sabzi. Makes cooking easier and more flavorful for busy kitchens.
shortDescription: All-purpose vegetable masala for Indian cooking
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

title: Pav Bhaji Masala
name: Pav Bhaji Masala
description: Authentic Mumbai-style pav bhaji masala with the perfect blend of spices for that street food taste. Rich, aromatic, and flavorful blend that brings the authentic taste of Mumbai's famous pav bhaji to your kitchen.
shortDescription: Authentic Mumbai-style pav bhaji spice blend
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container.

title: Amul Gold Full Cream Milk
name: Amul Gold Full Cream Milk
description: Premium full cream milk from Amul with rich taste and high nutritional value. Perfect for daily consumption, tea, coffee, and cooking. Rich in protein, calcium, and vitamins.
shortDescription: Premium full cream milk, rich in nutrients
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place. Keep container tightly closed.

title: Nestlé Everyday Dairy Whitener
name: Nestlé Everyday Dairy Whitener
description: Nestlé Everyday dairy whitener with rich and creamy taste. Made from quality milk, perfect for enhancing the taste of your tea and coffee.
shortDescription: Rich and creamy dairy whitener from Nestlé
storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

title: Sanchi Milk Powder
name: Sanchi Milk Powder
description: Pure milk powder from Sanchi made from fresh cow milk. Ideal for making milk instantly and for cooking purposes. Rich in calcium and proteins.
shortDescription: Pure milk powder from fresh cow milk
storageInstructions: Keep in airtight container. Store in cool, dry place.

title: Nestlé Milkmaid Condensed Milk
name: Nestlé Milkmaid Condensed Milk
description: Premium sweetened condensed milk from Nestlé Milkmaid. Perfect for making desserts, sweets, and beverages. Thick, creamy texture with rich taste.
shortDescription: Premium sweetened condensed milk for desserts
storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Refrigerate after opening.

title: Sanchi Full Cream Milk
name: Sanchi Full Cream Milk
description: Pure and fresh full cream milk from Sanchi with natural goodness. Ideal for families who prefer rich and creamy milk for daily consumption.
shortDescription: Pure full cream milk with natural goodness
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated. Best consumed within 3 days.

title: Mother Dairy Full Cream Milk
name: Mother Dairy Full Cream Milk
description: High quality full cream milk from Mother Dairy with consistent taste and nutrition. Trusted by millions of families across India.
shortDescription: Trusted full cream milk with consistent quality
storageInstructions: Refrigerate immediately. Use within 3 days of opening.

title: Amul Slim & Trim Skimmed Milk
name: Amul Slim & Trim Skimmed Milk
description: Amul's fat-free skimmed milk perfect for weight-conscious individuals. Retains all essential nutrients while removing fat content completely.
shortDescription: Fat-free skimmed milk for weight management
storageInstructions: Refrigerate at 4°C. Consume within 3 days of opening.

title: Amul Kool Flavored Milk - Chocolate
name: Amul Kool Flavored Milk - Chocolate
description: Delicious chocolate flavored milk from Amul Kool. Perfect treat for kids and adults alike with rich chocolate taste and nutritional benefits of milk.
shortDescription: Delicious chocolate flavored milk in 200ml pack
storageInstructions: Refrigerate after opening. Best served chilled.

title: Amul Kool Flavored Milk - Strawberry
name: Amul Kool Flavored Milk - Strawberry
description: Delicious Strawberry flavored milk from Amul Kool. Perfect treat for kids and adults alike with rich Strawberry taste and nutritional benefits of milk.
shortDescription: Delicious Strawberry flavored milk in 200ml pack
storageInstructions: Refrigerate after opening. Best served chilled.

title: Amul Kool Flavored Milk - kesar
name: Amul Kool Flavored Milk - kesar
description: Delicious kesar flavored milk from Amul Kool. Perfect treat for kids and adults alike with rich kesar taste and nutritional benefits of milk.
shortDescription: Delicious kesar flavored milk in 200ml pack
storageInstructions: Refrigerate after opening. Best served chilled.
